TLabel: Securities Borrowed, Fair Value of Collateral
Doc: Fair value of the securities received as collateral against securities borrowed.
Tlabel Lowercase: securities borrowed, fair value of collateral
Doc Lowercase: fair value of the securities received as collateral against securities borrowed.

TLabel: Line of Credit Facility, Maximum Borrowing Capacity
Doc: Maximum borrowing capacity under the credit facility without consideration of any current restrictions on the amount that could be borrowed or the amounts currently outstanding under the facility.
Tlabel Lowercase: line of credit facility, maximum borrowing capacity
Doc Lowercase: maximum borrowing capacity under the credit facility without consideration of any current restrictions on the amount that could be borrowed or the amounts currently outstanding under the facility.

TLabel: Securities Sold under Agreements to Repurchase, Gross
Doc: Amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. Includes liabilities elected not to be offset. Excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.
Tlabel Lowercase: securities sold under agreements to repurchase, gross
Doc Lowercase: amount, before effects of master netting arrangements, of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price. includes liabilities elected not to be offset. excludes liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement.

TLabel: Line of Credit Facility, Remaining Borrowing Capacity
Doc: Amount of borrowing capacity currently available under the credit facility (current borrowing capacity less the amount of borrowings outstanding).
Tlabel Lowercase: line of credit facility, remaining borrowing capacity
Doc Lowercase: amount of borrowing capacity currently available under the credit facility (current borrowing capacity less the amount of borrowings outstanding).

TLabel: Line of Credit Facility, Current Borrowing Capacity
Doc: Amount of current borrowing capacity under the credit facility considering any current restrictions on the amount that could be borrowed (for example, borrowings may be limited by the amount of current assets), but without considering any amounts currently outstanding under the facility.
Tlabel Lowercase: line of credit facility, current borrowing capacity
Doc Lowercase: amount of current borrowing capacity under the credit facility considering any current restrictions on the amount that could be borrowed (for example, borrowings may be limited by the amount of current assets), but without considering any amounts currently outstanding under the facility.

Doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term unsecured obligations issued by corporations and other borrowers to investors (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.
Doc Lowercase: carrying value as of the balance sheet date of long-term unsecured obligations issued by corporations and other borrowers to investors (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

Doc: The outstanding call money and fund borrowed by a bank from another bank to meet its reserve requirements.
Doc Lowercase: the outstanding call money and fund borrowed by a bank from another bank to meet its reserve requirements.

Doc: The amount borrowed from credit institutions at the end of the reporting period.
Doc Lowercase: the amount borrowed from credit institutions at the end of the reporting period.

Doc: The amount borrowed from public at the end of the reporting period.
Doc Lowercase: the amount borrowed from public at the end of the reporting period.

Doc: Amounts borrowed to finance the purchase of specific new vehicle inventories with the corresponding manufacturers' captive finance subsidiaries ("trade lenders") and specific new and, to a lesser extent, used vehicle inventories with non-trade lenders (lenders that are not captive finance subsidiaries of the manufacturer).
Doc Lowercase: amounts borrowed to finance the purchase of specific new vehicle inventories with the corresponding manufacturers' captive finance subsidiaries ("trade lenders") and specific new and, to a lesser extent, used vehicle inventories with non-trade lenders (lenders that are not captive finance subsidiaries of the manufacturer).

TLabel: Short Term Borrowings Under Money Market Liquidity Facility
Doc: Short Term Borrowings Under Money Market Liquidity Facility
Tlabel Lowercase: short term borrowings under money market liquidity facility
Doc Lowercase: short term borrowings under money market liquidity facility

Doc: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of bank borrowings due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
Doc Lowercase: carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of bank borrowings due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

TLabel: All Other Liabilities, Consolidated Variable Interest Entity
Doc: Amount of all other liabilities not separately listed; includes short-term borrowings, derivative liabilities, and accrued expenses and other liabilities.
Tlabel Lowercase: all other liabilities, consolidated variable interest entity
Doc Lowercase: amount of all other liabilities not separately listed; includes short-term borrowings, derivative liabilities, and accrued expenses and other liabilities.

TLabel: Obligation To Return Cash or Securities Received as Collateral
Doc: The cash or fair value of collateral received by the entity associated with securities borrowed that must be returned if the counterparty fulfills its obligations. It appears on the balance sheet as a liability and has a corresponding asset on the balance sheet, either cash or securities, depending on which was received as the collateral.
Tlabel Lowercase: obligation to return cash or securities received as collateral
Doc Lowercase: the cash or fair value of collateral received by the entity associated with securities borrowed that must be returned if the counterparty fulfills its obligations. it appears on the balance sheet as a liability and has a corresponding asset on the balance sheet, either cash or securities, depending on which was received as the collateral.

Doc: Accrued interest payable on deposit liabilities, outstanding borrowings and other liabilities.
Doc Lowercase: accrued interest payable on deposit liabilities, outstanding borrowings and other liabilities.

Doc: The obligation from funds furnished by a borrower to a lender to assure future payments. Escrow deposits may be received for a variety of purposes such as earnest money and contingent payments.
Doc Lowercase: the obligation from funds furnished by a borrower to a lender to assure future payments. escrow deposits may be received for a variety of purposes such as earnest money and contingent payments.

Doc: The amount of current borrowings from related parties.
Doc Lowercase: the amount of current borrowings from related parties.

Doc: The amount of short-term borrowings from third parties
Doc Lowercase: the amount of short-term borrowings from third parties

Doc: Premium financing borrowings.
Doc Lowercase: premium financing borrowings.

Doc: Amount of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price.
Doc Lowercase: amount of funds outstanding borrowed in the form of a security repurchase agreement between the entity and another party for the sale and repurchase of identical or substantially the same securities at a date certain for a specified price.

TLabel: Secured Borrowings, Net Of Deferred Financing Costs
Doc: Secured borrowings, net of deferred financing costs.
Tlabel Lowercase: secured borrowings, net of deferred financing costs
Doc Lowercase: secured borrowings, net of deferred financing costs.

Doc: Federal funds purchased, repurchase agreements, and other short-term borrowings

Doc Lowercase: federal funds purchased, repurchase agreements, and other short-term borrowings

TLabel: Borrowings Under Financing Agreement Non Current

Tlabel Lowercase: borrowings under financing agreement non current

TLabel: Transfers Accounted For As Secured Borrowings, Associated Liabilities, Current Portion
Doc: Transfers Accounted For As Secured Borrowings, Associated Liabilities, Current Portion

TLabel: Unsecured Short Term Borrowings Including Current Portion Of Unsecured Long Term Borrowings
Doc: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of unsecured short-term borrowings (with maturities due within one year) including the current portion of unsecured long-term borrowings.
Tlabel Lowercase: unsecured short term borrowings including current portion of unsecured long term borrowings
Doc Lowercase: carrying value as of the balance sheet date of unsecured short-term borrowings (with maturities due within one year) including the current portion of unsecured long-term borrowings.

Doc: Obligation to Return Securities Borrowed Under Reverse Repurchase Agreements at Fair Value

Doc: Non Recourse Borrowings, Noncurrent

Doc: This element represents the current portion of non-recourse borrowings of consolidated securitization entities.

Doc: Current borrowings from related parties.

TLabel: Borrowings Related To Variable Interest Entities
Doc: The borrowings of the variable interest entities that are to be repaid from available cash flows from the assets of the variable interest entities.
Tlabel Lowercase: borrowings related to variable interest entities
Doc Lowercase: the borrowings of the variable interest entities that are to be repaid from available cash flows from the assets of the variable interest entities.

Doc: Amount of borrowings as of the balance sheet date of FHLB and other borrowings
Doc Lowercase: amount of borrowings as of the balance sheet date of fhlb and other borrowings

TLabel: Securities Sold Under Agreements to Repurchase and Other Short Term Borrowings
Doc: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of securities that an institution sells and agrees to repurchase (the identical or substantially the same securities) as a seller-borrower at a specified date for a specified price, also known as a repurchase agreement, or repo. Most repos involve obligations of the federal government or its agencies, but other financial instruments, such as commercial paper, banker's acceptances, and negotiable certificates of deposit, are sometimes used in repos. Also includes sum of the carrying amounts at the balance sheet date of short-term borrowings not otherwise specified in the taxonomy having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.
Tlabel Lowercase: securities sold under agreements to repurchase and other short term borrowings
Doc Lowercase: the carrying value as of the balance sheet date of securities that an institution sells and agrees to repurchase (the identical or substantially the same securities) as a seller-borrower at a specified date for a specified price, also known as a repurchase agreement, or repo. most repos involve obligations of the federal government or its agencies, but other financial instruments, such as commercial paper, banker's acceptances, and negotiable certificates of deposit, are sometimes used in repos. also includes sum of the carrying amounts at the balance sheet date of short-term borrowings not otherwise specified in the taxonomy having initial terms less than one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

Doc: As of the balance sheet date, the sum of FHLB advances, repurchase agreements and fed funds purchased.
Doc Lowercase: as of the balance sheet date, the sum of fhlb advances, repurchase agreements and fed funds purchased.

Doc: Short term borrowings excluding repurchase agreements.

Doc: Represents the sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of all fund borrowings, excluding collateralized financings.
